rukus.text: Sbuccuaen Oebbi, kra illan deg igenwan, akked kra illan di tmurt. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
A wid iumnen! Acimi id teqqaoem ayen ur txeddmem
D laao meqqwoen, ar Oebbi, ma teqqaoem ayen ur txeddmem
Ih, Oebbi Ieemmel wid ipna$en deg ubrid iS, d uuef, nitni, amzun d lebni, ieeveen
Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Acimi la yi teiiuoum, u ni$ teeoam nek d amazan n Oebbi $uowen"? Mi ff$en i ubrid, Oebbi Issuffe$ i ubrid ulawen nnsen. Oebbi ur Inehhu ara agdud iballa$en

Mi inna Aisa, mmi s n Meryem: "A yAt Isoail! Nek d amazan n Oebbi $uowen, ad tebbte$ ayen iyi d izwaren n Tuoa. U a kwen beccoe$ s Umazan ara d iasen, deffir i, ism is Aemed". Mi ten id iusa s ubeggen, nnan: "wagi d sseur n uuee
Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas af Oebbi, u neppa ipwanced ar wannuz? Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
B$an ad ssexsin tafat n Oebbi, s imawen nnsen. Oebbi ad Itim tafat iS, di nneqwma ijehliyen
D Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS, s nnhaya, d ddin n tidep, iwakken a t issifrir f ddin meooa, di nneqwma ijehliyen
